DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study evaluate effect diquafosol tetrasodium Ophthalmic Solution , 2 % dry eye subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effect Diquafosol Tetrasodium Ophthalmic Solution , 2 % Versus Placebo Dry Eye Subjects ( P08634 )
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent prior study procedure perform . Have best correct visual acuity ( BCVAof +0.7 well . Have history dry eye ( keratoconjunctivitis sicca ) eye Have ongoing dry eye disease , qualify eye eye . Have previously LASIK refractive surgery . Use topical ophthalmic medication , prep , gel lid scrub study . Have penetrate intraocular surgery past 90 day . Have ocular surface surgery ( e.g. , refractive , pterygium ) within past year . Have diagnosis ongoing ocular infection , clinically significant blepharitis , lid margin inflammation , StevensJohnson syndrome pemphigoid . Any serious ocular systemic disease uncontrolled medical condition . Exposure investigational drug within 30 day study start .
